refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The AgsFile is an object to read or write files using XML. It is the persisting layer of Advanced Gtk+ Sequencer.

refsect2.title: ags_file_str2md5 ()
refsect2.para: Compute MD5 sums of a buffer.

refsect2.title: ags_file_add_id_ref ()
refsect2.para: Find a reference by its XML node.

refsect2.title: ags_file_open ()
refsect2.para: Opens the file specified by :filename property.

refsect2.title: ags_file_open_from_data ()
refsect2.para: Opens the file provided by data .

entry.para: a buffer containing the XML document

refsect2.title: ags_file_rw_open ()
refsect2.para: Opens the file specified by :filename property in read-write mode.

entry.para: if TRUE create the file as needed

refsect2.title: ags_file_open_filename ()
refsect2.para: Opens the file specified by filename property.

refsect2.title: ags_file_write ()
refsect2.para: Write the XML document to disk.

refsect2.title: The “application-context” property
refsect2.para: The application context to write to file.

refsect2.title: The “audio-encoding” property
refsect2.para: The encoding to use for embedding audio data.

refsect2.title: The “audio-format” property
refsect2.para: The format of embedded audio data.

refsect2.title: The “filename” property
refsect2.para: The assigned filename to open and read from.

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

entry.para: if TRUE the file will be created if not exists

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The “read” signal
refsect2.para: Read a XML document from disk with specified filename.

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The “write-resolve” signal
refsect2.para: Resolve references and generate thus XPath expressions just before writing to disk.

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.
